LanguageData.ToolAutoSwitch_desc: Should pawns switch back to their favourite tools/weapons after they are done with their job?
LanguageData.CanSetToolsAsFavourites_desc: Should the player be able to select tools as favourites?
LanguageData.OptimalMelee_desc: Should pawns automatically switch to a higher DPS melee weapon?
LanguageData.CQCAutoSwitch_desc: Should pawns switch to their melee sidearms when attacked in melee?
LanguageData.CQCFistSwitch_desc: Should pawns switch even when they are not using a weapon?
LanguageData.CQCTargetOnly_desc: Should pawns only react to attacks from their current target?
LanguageData.CQCTargetOnly_title: Switch only on attacks from target
LanguageData.RangedNonCombatAutoSwitch_desc: Should pawns switch to range-appropriate ranged sidearms when not in combat?
LanguageData.RangedNonCombatAutoSwitch_title: Use best ranged weapon out of combat
LanguageData.StopOtherModsFromChangingFavourites_titl: Stop other mods from changing Favourites or Defaults
LanguageData.StopOtherModsFromChangingFavourites_desc: This should prevent most instances where other mods take control of weapon switching from effecting SS favourites or defaults.
LanguageData.DropMode_desc: In which situations might pawns fumble and drop their weapon instead of moving it to their inventory?
LanguageData.FumbleRecoveryChance_hint: Vertical axis is chance to avoid fumbling Horizontal axis is melee or ranged skill (whichever is better)
LanguageData.ReEquipOutOfCombat_desc: After having dropped a weapon, auto-re-equip it after combat once out of immediate danger.
LanguageData.ReEquipBest_desc: Auto-re-equip will find the best weapon available (instead of the closest)
LanguageData.ReEquipInCombat_desc: Auto-re-equip weapons even in combat, when not actively fighting.
LanguageData.SkipDangerousWeapons_desc: Disallow auto-equip of dangerous weapons (molotov cocktails, frag grenades, rocket launchers, etc.)
LanguageData.SkipEMPWeapons_desc: Disallow auto-equip of EMP weapons (note that pawns will only consider auto-equipping these when fighting mechanoids anyway).
LanguageData.PreserveInventoryInCaravans_desc: Keep sidearms in the right inventory when returning from caravans. (Experimental, implemented by XT-0xFF @Github)
LanguageData.HideSidearmsInCaravanDialogs_desc: Hide sideams in caravan dialogs, to prevent accidentaly selling them. (Experimental, implemented by XT-0xFF @Github)
LanguageData.ShowAlertsMissingSidearm_desc: Show alerts for colonists that remember having sidearms that they no longer have and can't find a replacement for.
LanguageData.GizmoPerformanceMode_desc: Enable better gizmo performance by only showing weapon icons on mouse over.
LanguageData.AllowBlockedWeaponUse_desc: Allow usage of weapons that are normally blocked (such as persona weapons, biocoded weapons, and Ideology role-restricted weapons) - see XKCD #1172
LanguageData.LimitCarryInfo_title: Always limited by pawn's carry capacity
LanguageData.CEOverrideInfo_title: Disabled in favor of CE's system.
LanguageData.LimitModeAmount_desc: What restrictions are there on all sidearms.
LanguageData.LimitModeAmountMelee_desc: What restrictions are there on all melee sidearms.
LanguageData.LimitModeAmountRanged_desc: What restrictions are there on all ranged sidearms.
LanguageData.LimitModeSingle_desc: What restrictions are there on individual sidearms.
LanguageData.LimitModeSingleMelee_desc: What restrictions are there on individual melee sidearms.
LanguageData.LimitModeSingleRanged_desc: What restrictions are there on individual ranged sidearms.
LanguageData.LimitModeAmountTotal_desc: What restrictions are there on all sidearms.
LanguageData.MaximumMassAmountAbsolute_desc: Maximum total mass of sidearms a pawn can carry.
LanguageData.MaximumMassAmountRelative_desc: Maximum total mass percentage of sidearms a pawn can carry relative to their carry capacity.
LanguageData.MaximumMassSingleAbsolute_desc: Maximum mass of a single sidearm a pawn can carry.
LanguageData.MaximumMassSingleRelative_desc: Maximum mass percentage of a single sidearm a pawn can carry relative to their carry capacity.
LanguageData.MaximumSlots_desc: How many sidearms can a pawn carry.
LanguageData.RangedCombatAutoSwitchMaxWarmup_desc: What is the threshold after which a pawn will refuse to interrupt their attack to switch to a sidearm?
LanguageData.RangedCombatAutoSwitch_desc: Should pawns switch to range-appropriate ranged sidearms when attacking at range?
LanguageData.SeparateModes_desc: Should melee and ranged weapons have shared or separate restrictions?
LanguageData.SingleshotAutoSwitch_desc: Should pawns switch to sidearms after expending single-use weapons?
LanguageData.SpeedSelectionBiasMelee_desc: Pawn bias towards selecting weapons with faster attack speed.
LanguageData.SpeedSelectionBiasRanged_desc: Pawn bias towards selecting weapons with faster warmup.
LanguageData.WeaponMatch_desc: These are the weapons that match the given criteria.
LanguageData.MaximumMassAmountRelative_hint: Listing assumes standard carry capacity of 35 kg
LanguageData.SidearmSpawnChance_desc: The chance for any pawn that spawns with a weapon to also have a sidearm.
LanguageData.SidearmSpawnChanceDropoff_desc: The amount by which the chance to spawn a sidearm is reduced by per additional sidearm.
LanguageData.SidearmBudgetMultiplier_desc: The amount of money a sidearm can be worth, based on the default primary weapon.
LanguageData.SidearmBudgetDropoff_desc: The amount by which the budget is reduced by per additional sidearm.
LanguageData.ColonistDefaultWeaponMode_desc: The default weapon preference mode for player-controlled pawns.
LanguageData.NPCDefaultWeaponMode_desc: The default weapon preference mode for NPC pawns.
LanguageData.PresetCustom_desc: Custom settings. Automatically selected upon making a change.
LanguageData.Preset0_desc: All options disabled. Good base for configurations that use only a small portion of the mod's features.
LanguageData.Preset1half_desc: Allows a single light weapon as a sidearm.
LanguageData.Preset1_desc: Allows equipping sidearms, but nothing else. Essentially a convenient inventory extension.
LanguageData.Preset2_desc: A simple setup. Pawns can use a few light weapons and will attempt to use them in appropriate situations.
LanguageData.Preset3_desc: Pawns get more creative with their weapon selection, but still remain within what one would expect possible from regular people trying to survive on a dangerous rimworld.
LanguageData.Preset4_desc: Bring all of it! Minigun? Bring two! Spears? I've got a whole collection in my backpack!
